scripts.lint: eslint . && echo '✅ ESLint: No issues found!' || (echo '❌ ESLint: Issues found. Run npm run lint:fix to auto-fix some issues.' && exit 1)
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix && echo '✅ ESLint: Auto-fixed issues successfully!' || (echo '❌ ESLint: Some issues could not be auto-fixed.' && exit 1)
scripts.format: prettier --write . && echo '✅ Prettier: Code formatted successfully!' || (echo '❌ Prettier: Formatting failed.' && exit 1)
scripts.format:check: prettier --check . && echo '✅ Prettier: All files are properly formatted!' || (echo '❌ Prettier: Formatting issues found. Run npm run format to fix.' && exit 1)
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit && echo '✅ TypeScript: No type errors found!' || (echo '❌ TypeScript: Type errors found. Fix the errors above.' && exit 1)
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && echo '✅ All checks passed!' || (echo '❌ Some checks failed. See errors above.' && exit 1)
scripts.test:run: vitest run && echo '✅ Tests: All tests passed!' || (echo '❌ Tests: Some tests failed.' && exit 1)
scripts.test:coverage: vitest run --coverage && echo '✅ Tests: Coverage report generated successfully!' || (echo '❌ Tests: Coverage generation failed.' && exit 1)
